Comment: The personal phones of top diplomats are obvious intelligence targets, and would be even if they kept them to themselves.  The SecDef using his personal phone for everything from Venmo to DraftKings exposed him to even the least sophisticated actors.  He didn't even get a new phone number when taking a Cabinet position.  The follow-up interview by The Atlantic includes the jaw-dropping detail that the Atlantic got the President's personal phone number and were able to simply call him while he was on the golf course.  He didn't recognize the number.   And he still answered it himself.  It's so gratifying that President Trump doesn't put on airs of sophistication and answers his phone like the blue-collar Everyman he really is.
Author: Aghast_Cornichon
